A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I'm a long time star wars fan\, grew up with tge first trilogy and prequels and I can say that this is the most badass and entertaining episode yet! Was not a fan of the force awakens fue to it's unoriginal plot but The Last Jedi made it all up to me. Strong character developement\, jaw dropping action scenes\, and fantastic story.\nIt is my new favorite episode.
